about_the_game:
"Initial D is an immersive story-driven racing simcade set in the picturesque Izu Peninsula of Shizuoka, Japan. Initial D combines the spirit of classic racing with the thrill of an evolving technological era where AI-driven transport has replaced personal vehicles in the name of efficiency and safety.

With a focus on realism, takes full advantage of a complex and highly accurate mobile mapping multi-scan system to recreate every intricate detail of the scenic touge roads.

Unleash your skills behind the wheel of iconic 90s vehicles, feel the adrenaline rush as you navigate hairpin turns, master drifts, and compete against formidable opponents.


MAIN FEATURES
Advanced graphics that recreate an immersive environment with dynamic lighting and realistic materials and surfaces, weather conditions, variable time of day, and real-time reflections.

The advanced physics engine provides a realistic driving experience, including features such tire deformation, tire temperature, tire wear, aerodynamics where all the available customizations make a difference, such as camber, suspension settings, gear ratios etc...


TRACKS
Most iconic multi kilometer long mountain roads of Izu Peninsula, including the Kawazu Nanadaru Loop Bridge route.


GAME MODES
  • Story mode
  • Free roam
  • Racing against AI
  • Time Attack


MODDING & CUSTOMIZATION
Initial D will allow for considerable customization and modification to reproduce and share cars, taking advantage of the same editing tools developed and used by the developer of the game.


Wishlist Initial D now to stay up to date on the latest news and updates!
detailed_description:
"Initial D is an immersive story-driven racing simcade set in the picturesque Izu Peninsula of Shizuoka, Japan. Initial D combines the spirit of classic racing with the thrill of an evolving technological era where AI-driven transport has replaced personal vehicles in the name of efficiency and safety.

With a focus on realism, takes full advantage of a complex and highly accurate mobile mapping multi-scan system to recreate every intricate detail of the scenic touge roads.

Unleash your skills behind the wheel of iconic 90s vehicles, feel the adrenaline rush as you navigate hairpin turns, master drifts, and compete against formidable opponents.


MAIN FEATURES
Advanced graphics that recreate an immersive environment with dynamic lighting and realistic materials and surfaces, weather conditions, variable time of day, and real-time reflections.

The advanced physics engine provides a realistic driving experience, including features such tire deformation, tire temperature, tire wear, aerodynamics where all the available customizations make a difference, such as camber, suspension settings, gear ratios etc...


TRACKS
Most iconic multi kilometer long mountain roads of Izu Peninsula, including the Kawazu Nanadaru Loop Bridge route.


GAME MODES
  • Story mode
  • Free roam
  • Racing against AI
  • Time Attack


MODDING & CUSTOMIZATION
Initial D will allow for considerable customization and modification to reproduce and share cars, taking advantage of the same editing tools developed and used by the developer of the game.


Wishlist Initial D now to stay up to date on the latest news and updates!
legal_notice: INITIAL D is an USPTO resgistered trademark. The game uses for environment reference, and may directly contain data from VIRTUAL SHIZUOKA dataset, this data is made public under CC license.
name: INITIAL D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: A group of thrill-seekers emerges, determined to awaken the dormant spirit within, longing for the long-lost excitement and danger of the past. Join them as they ignite the revolution.
